meanings.definition: Make a witty remark or comment.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys quipping with her friends during lunch.
meanings.sent2: He is known for quipping clever jokes at parties.
meanings.sent3: The comedian kept quipping throughout his entire stand-up routine.
meanings.sent4: Her quipping added a touch of humor to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The children were quipping back and forth, making everyone laugh.

meanings.sent1: His quipping always brings a smile to our faces.

meanings.sent3: The audience erupted in laughter at the comedian's latest quipping.
